alert.note: Alert for Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 05 at 10:33PM MDT until July 06 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT THURSDAY FOR NORTHERN BENT, CROWLEY, SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA AND NORTHERN OTERO COUNTIES... At 1033 PM MDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Water rescues were occurring at the railroad underpass in La Junta as multiple cars are trapped in high water at this underpass. Heavy rain has ended along the highway 50 corridor, and the probability of additional heavy rain occurring along the immediate highway 50 corridor is low. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Las Animas, Fowler, Ordway, Swink, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City, Cheraw, Crowley, Haswell, Arlington, Blue Lake, John Martin Reservoir, Hasty, McClave, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
